title: 3DTILES_draco_point_compression Feature Table extension
description: Specifies the compressed Feature Table properties and the location of the compressed data in the Feature Table binary.

properties.description: Defines the properties stored in the compressed data. Each property is associated with a unique ID. This ID is used to identify the property within the compressed data. No two properties in the Feature Table and Batch Table may use the same ID.

byteOffset.description: A zero-based offset relative to the start of the Feature Table binary at which the compressed data starts.

byteLength.description: The length, in bytes, of the compressed data.
